bibl.title: A Liturgical Diptych from Coptic Egypt in the Museum of Fine Arts.
bibl.note: Boston, Museum of Fine Arts. Dept of Class. Art. Acc. No. 72.4358 = Romans and Barbarians. Catalogue of an exhibition (Boston, 1976) No. 233, p. 199, with ill. Originally published in: Catalogue of the Collection of Egyptian Antiquites belonging to the late Robert Hay, Esq. (London, 1869) No. 554, p. 60. List of patriarchs of Alexandria. 7th cent.
bibl.seg: McCormick Michael, A Liturgical Diptych from Coptic Egypt in the Museum of Fine Arts.
